headline: PepsiCo (PEP): Revisiting Valuation After Recent Share Price Softness Despite Ongoing Earnings Growth
summary: PepsiCo (PEP) has been treading water lately, with the stock slipping over the past week even as revenue and earnings continue to grow. That disconnect sets up an interesting value conversation. See our latest analysis for PepsiCo. At the current share price of $145.02, PepsiCo’s 30 day share price return is modestly positive while its 1 year total shareholder return remains negative, suggesting sentiment has cooled even as earnings and cash generation keep the longer term story intact. If...

headline: 3 Dividend Stocks to Double Up on Right Now
summary: If you are looking for dividends, now is a good time to consider this boring high-yield stock, or this high-yield turnaround, or this reliable Dividend King.
